Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣の力は、これで二つ目か…… 次は誰なんだろうな……
Entry.EnglishText: This is the second time someone's acquired the power of a Sacred Beast... I wonder who's getting one next...?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ、なんだ？ もしかして、コワイのか？
Entry.EnglishText: What's this, what's this? Don't tell me you're scared?

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスに加えて聖獣の力まで持ったとなれば、 自分がどうなってしまう事やら……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know what would happen to me if I had the power of a Sacred Beast in addition to my Force...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>の不安もわからないではない。
Entry.EnglishText: So it's not like I don't understand <Veigue>'s concerns.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ、なんだよ、<Eugene>まで。 おれが使いこなせてるんだぜ？ 大丈夫だって。
Entry.EnglishText: What's this, what's this? You too, <Eugene>? Aren't I handling it just fine? It'll be all right.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そうだな…… 心配したオレがバカだった……
Entry.EnglishText: ...You're right... I was a fool for worrying...

Entry.JapaneseText: ん？ ……それで納得されるのも、 なんかシャクな気が……ま、いっか……
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? ...I feel somewhat offended that was what convinced you... Oh well...
